title: Team Meeting Notes
content:
1. Review last sprint outcomes
2. Discuss Q4 roadmap priorities
3. Resource allocation for new features
4. Timeline review and adjustments

Key topics to cover:
- Mobile app development progress
- API authentication implementation
- Design system finalization
- User testing feedback integration

title: Project Ideas
content:
Some interesting project concepts to explore:
• AI-powered note organization
• Real-time collaboration features
• Voice-to-text integration
• Smart tag suggestions

title: Research Notes
content:
Key findings from user interviews:
- Users want better search functionality
- Mobile experience needs improvement
- Integration with external tools is important
